rules_text: Choose up to one nonland permanent. Return the rest to their owners’ hands.
notes:
alt art: Kagaya Yutaka
RAREWIPE
POTENTIALLY REDESIGN
Target player reveals the top seven cards of their library. An opponent of their choice separates those cards into two piles. That player chooses up to X cards from one pile, puts those cards into their hand, then puts the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of their library in a random order.
